data.message:
i keep getting this message on my fan page when I try to share a photo from my album:"This content is no longer available
The content you requested cannot be displayed right now. It may be temporarily unavailable, the link you clicked on may have expired, or you may not have permission to view this page."  What do I do?  This happens with every photo in my album.

replies.message: Hey Molly. If the photo has restrictions set upon it (anything other than a public photo) then your sharing ability has also been restricted. To learn how to change the privacy settings of your photo albums, please visit our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/215496745135618. Hope this helps! -Hailey
It has no restrictions, it's a public photo in my album on my fan page Dogworks by Molly Yang
It seems to be working now, thanks
